_metadata.name: Equipment Congregation Configuration
_metadata.description: Synergy coefficients and configuration for equipment congregation effects
_metadata.theoretical_basis: Equipment congregation represents synergistic skill combinations that produce multiplicative capacity gains

delta.name: Congregation sensitivity parameter
delta.description: Controls the strength of synergy effects

rho.name: Synergy coefficient
rho.description: Base multiplier for specific skill combinations

n_skills.name: Number of distinct skills
n_skills.description: Count of different policy skills congregated

evidence_action_nexus.name: Evidence-Action Nexus
evidence_action_nexus.description: Synergy between analytical rigor and operational implementation
evidence_action_nexus.theoretical_basis: Evidence-based policy requires both robust analysis AND execution capacity
exemplars: Policy evaluation units with implementation authority

presence_signals: Methods that analyze AND prescribe actions
strength_indicators: Integration of analysis outputs into operational workflows
Feedback loops from implementation to analysis

strategic_intelligence.name: Strategic Intelligence
strategic_intelligence.description: Synergy between evidence-based analysis and political feasibility
strategic_intelligence.theoretical_basis: Effective policy requires both technical soundness AND political viability

presence_signals: Methods that assess political feasibility of analytical findings
Stakeholder analysis combined with evidence synthesis
Political risk assessment integrated with data analysis
strength_indicators: Policy recommendations account for political constraints
Analytical outputs framed for political audiences

adaptive_governance.name: Adaptive Governance
adaptive_governance.description: Synergy between execution capacity and political legitimacy
adaptive_governance.theoretical_basis: Implementation success requires both operational capacity AND stakeholder support

presence_signals: Operational planning with political risk assessment
strength_indicators: Operations maintain public trust and legitimacy

integrated_capacity.name: Integrated Capacity
integrated_capacity.description: Full trinity: evidence, execution, and legitimacy combined
integrated_capacity.theoretical_basis: Maximum policy capacity requires ALL three skills working synergistically

presence_signals: Methods spanning all three skill dimensions
strength_indicators: Seamless flow from analysis to implementation to legitimation
All three skills reinforce each other

synergy_coefficients._description: Complete synergy coefficient matrix for all skill combinations

default.name: Default Configuration
default.description: Standard synergy effects as theoretically derived

high_synergy.name: High Synergy Configuration
high_synergy.description: Enhanced synergy for highly integrated environments

conservative.name: Conservative Configuration
conservative.description: Modest synergy effects for uncertain contexts

empirical_calibration.name: Empirically Calibrated
empirical_calibration.description: Coefficients calibrated against empirical policy capacity data

by_level.description: Apply congregation separately for each policy level
by_level.rationale: Synergies manifest differently at Individual/Organizational/Systemic levels

threshold_for_skill_presence.description: Minimum score for a skill to be considered present in congregation
threshold_for_skill_presence.rationale: Even minimal capacity in a skill contributes to synergy

congregation_stacking.description: Whether multiple congregation effects can stack
congregation_stacking.rationale: Avoid multiplicative explosion; use highest applicable congregation

partial_congregation.description: Allow partial synergy when not all skills reach full strength

congregation_active.description: When to consider a congregation as actively providing synergy

synergy_significant.description: When synergy effect is considered significant
